name: Codyhouse Color Importer
description:
Import your colors from Codyhouse to Figma like never before!


Features:

This plugin can:

  • Import colors from Codyhouse: UI Framework -> Globals -> Colors
  • Create "color sample" circles from imported color
  • Split color to themes



How to use?

  1. Open Codyhouse and go to color editor (UI Framework -> Globals -> Colors).
  2. Create your color system and test this.
  3. Click to Copy SCSS
  4. Open Figma and run this plugin.
  5. Paste your SCSS code in textarea.
  6. Click to Generate Color.
  7. And "Voila!)" You have imported colors into your color schemes!
